1. Launch Throne and Liberty and progress to the Title Screen

2. Either select an existing character if you have one, or create a new character if you do not

3. Complete the tutorial and progress to Kastelton to unlock the Coupon feature

4. Open the Main Menu and select the Coupon button from the right-most pane

5. Enter the coupon code received, then press the "Use" button

6. The Ornate Coins received will automatically be added to your balance once the coupon is claimed


Coupon codes from this Quest can only be used once per account. Coupon codes received are valid until 10/31. Coupon codes can only be claimed after completing the tutorial and reaching Kastelton

To redeem your Celestial Ties Shader, visit Bungie.net/redeem and sign into your account.

You can then enter the code you received and pick up your Celestial Ties Shader in the Tower at the Special Deliveries terminal between the Cryptarch and Gunsmith.

Redemption code expires 12/31/2024 0:00:00 (UTC-8).

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
**Claim Your Code Online**

1. Log into your Account Overview: [account.blizzard.com/overview](https://account.blizzard.com/overview)

2. Enter the code in the Redeem a Code box and click Redeem Code

**Claim Your Code on the Battle.net Desktop App**

1. Login to the Battle.net Desktop App

2. Click your profile icon at the top right corner of the App

3. Click Redeem Code

*Note: Reward code must be redeemed on Battle.net but will be accessible on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Steam, as long as the user has a valid Diablo IV license. Ensure that your Battle.net ID is linked to your gaming platform. After redeeming the code on Battle.net, your items will be available the next time you log into your selected platform.*

How To Use Redeem Codes


1. Once you have a Redeem Code, head over to https://bit.ly/SNAPredeem to redeem it!

2. To proceed, you will need to verify your SNAP ID, which can be found in-game at the bottom of your settings page. Simply tap on it to reveal your ID.

3. Once your code is successfully redeemed, the reward will be sent to your in-game inbox!

4. Please note, the Redeem Code is valid from Pacific Time (PT): October 17, 2024, 9:00:00 AM to October 31, 2024, 8:59:59 AM.

To redeem your item, press F3 or ESC in the game to access the event interface (you must complete the tutorial first). Once there, either press X or click the “Redeem Code” button in the bottom right. Enter your code in the pop-up window and hit REDEEM to claim your reward.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.4:
**1. How to redeem in-game:**

**[PC]**
 Start The First Descendant > Press [Esc] > [Options] > [Account] > [Enter] in the Enter Coupon option.
 Enter the coupon code and press [Confirm].
 Press [G] > [Albion] and access the mailbox to receive the item.

**[Consoles]**
 Start The First Descendant > Press [Options] > [Account] > [Enter] in the Enter Coupon option. Enter the coupon code and press [Confirm]. Access the mailbox in Albion to receive the item.

**2. How to redeem on the Coupons page:**

**[PC & Consoles]**
 Enter The First Descendant’s Coupon page https://mcoupon.nexon.com/tfd.
 Enter your member code and coupon number to redeem the item.
 The member code can be copied from the Game Menu > Options > Account > Member Code.

 Rewards will be available until *December 31st at 23:59 (PT)*.

3. Connect to the server using the IP: playskyward.gg. and redeem Your Pet Code.  
4. Once inside the server, locate the Skyward Redemption NPC in the main hub area.  
5. Approach the NPC and right-click to interact.  
6. The Anvil GUI will open as a text prompt.  
7. Enter your one-time use code in the text prompt and confirm.  
8. Upon successful redemption, your exclusive pet will be added to your inventory.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0: Congrats! You earned 1 day of Nitro.

(1) Redemption Code Usage and Restrictions

a. The eligible servers for using the Zenless Zone Zero redemption code: America; Asia; Europe; TW, HK, MO

b. How to Redeem:

Log in to Zenless Zone Zero, click the menu button in the top-left of the in-game screen, head to "More" > "Redemption Code," and follow the onscreen prompts to enter your redemption code. Your bundle will be sent to your in-game "Mail."

*Mail and Redemption Code functions will be unlocked during the Prologue "Business x Strangeness x Justness."


(2) Redemption Code Contents

Polychrome ×30, Denny ×20,000, Senior Investigator Log ×2, W-Engine Energy Module ×3, Bangboo System Widget ×2

*Note: Polychrome rewards are limited to 300,000 recipients. Only the first 300,000 Proxies to complete the Quest will receive the reward. The time of completion will be determined based on when the bundle code is redeemed after completing the play quest. First come, first served.

**The redemption code will expire on 2025/07/12 12:00:00 (UTC+8). Please redeem the code as soon as possible.

Reward Instructions:
Congratulations on getting an in-game reward for Dune: Awakening. In order to claim the item in-game follow these steps:

Step 1: Go to duneawakening.com/account.  
Step 2: Follow the steps to link your Steam account to your email.  
Step 3: Navigate to "Redeem Key" on the navigation on the left-hand side.  
Step 4: Enter the code where it says "Product Key".  
Step 5: Click continue.  
Step 6: Click confirm. 

**Note: You need to own any version of Dune: Awakening in your Steam Library for this to work.**

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
1. Go to myaccounts.wizards.com  
2. Sign in.  
3. Click into the text box on the right, under Redeem A Code.  
4. Enter a code.  
5. Press Redeem.  
6. If you have entered a code successfully, you will see a confirmation message.  
7. When you open the MTG Arena app and go to the Store tab, you will receive your redeemed items.

messages.name_with_article: a WHO GAVE HIM A GUN? Avatar Decoration

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
If your character has already had the gun skin: tiger roar, please use the redeem code for another character

STEP 1. Access the event interface.
Once you enter the game scene, you can press F3 to access the event interface.
You can also press the ESC key and click the button shown in the image below to access the event interface.

Note: You need to complete the tutorial level before you can access the event interface.

STEP 2. Use the redeem code.
1)When you are in the event interface, you can press the "X" key, or simply click the "Redeem Code" button at the bottom right with the left mouse button to access the Redeem Code interface.

2) In the pop-up Redeem Code interface, enter the redeem code you received and click "REDEEM" to successfully redeem it.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0: Redeem the code below on [Delta Force Official Website](https://www.playdeltaforce.com/en/cdkredeem.html) redemption page to get access to your reward.

How to redeem:
Visit the code redemption page on the official website of [Honkai: Star Rail](https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift). 

Log in to your game account and follow the instructions to input the code. Once redeemed, you will receive the Bundle through the in-game mail system.
Redemption Code Content: Stellar Jade ×30*, Credit ×20,000, Lost Gold Fragment ×4, Condensed Aether ×5, Traveler's Guide ×3.

**Rewards are limited to 750,000 and will be available exclusively to the first 750,000 Trailblazers who successfully complete the Quest.**

 The distribution of rewards will be based on when the codes were redeemed after completing the stream task, and they will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis.

**The redemption code will expire on 2025/7/31 00:00:00 (UTC+8)**. We highly recommend redeeming it as soon as possible.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on completing the quest! You have two ways to claim your reward:

**Path 1**
- Visit [Code Redemption Page](https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/act/a20240731cdk) to redeem the code.
**Path 2**
- Launch the game and find **Reward Code Redemption** in the **Events** section.

**Rewards**
- **Light Desert Digital Camo SVDS Marksman Rifle (skin)**
- **ABI & Cyberpunk 2077 Collab Bundle ** 

**Support and Assistance**
**Arena Breakout: Infinite ** is now available to play for free.  
If you encounter any issues during the redemption process, please join our Discord server: [Arena Breakout: Infinite](https://discord.com/invite/arenabreakoutinfinite) for assistance and the latest information on future events and more rewards.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Redeem the code below on the Apex Legends redemption page to access your reward.

Codes are not platform specific and are redeemed from within the Apex Legends Storefront.  
1. Boot Apex Legends on your platform of choice.  
2. When on the lobby screen select [Store].  
3. Select [Redeem Code] on the bottom left.  
4. Enter the code you received.  
5. Select [Redeem].  

Requires EA account.

SHiFT codes can be redeemed for your SHiFT Account on the Gearbox SHiFT site, or via the in-game Social menu within Borderlands 4 at launch. If you don't have a SHiFT account, you can create one on the Gearbox SHiFT site! SHiFT accounts are free. Each code may be redeemed once (1) per SHiFT account.

1. Visit [the THRONE AND LIBERTY code redemption page](https://www.playthroneandliberty.com/en-us/community/code-redemption)  
2. Select your preferred platform and log in to your account  
3. Enter the code you received from the Discord Quest and hit "Redeem Reward."  

**Your reward will be available the next time you play THRONE AND LIBERTY**

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on earning an in-game reward for King of Meat! In order to claim it, follow these steps:

o        Visit the King of Meat Code Redemption Website.  
o        Select your preferred platform and log in to your account.  
o        Enter the code you received from the Discord Quest and hit "Redeem Reward".   You should see a confirmation message.  
o        The redeemed Item will appear in your inventory once you reach Contender Rank 2 in-game.  

**Reward Available: 10/7/2025 @ 10 AM PDT – 10/13/2025 @ 4:59 PM PDT **

Log in to redeem your code at: https://www.ea.com/games/battlefield/battlefield-6/redeem

1. Log in to your EA Account   
2. Redeem your in-game codes  
3. Link your platforms to your EA Account to play on any platform

How To Use Redeem Codes:  
1. Once you have a Redeem Code, head over to https://tinyurl.com/yzavuyet, sign up or create an account to redeem it!   
2. To proceed, you will need to go to your account, redeem your reward and copy/paste your Redeem Code.  
3. Once your code is successfully redeemed, the reward will be available in the full game once your link your PROS account in-game by scanning the QR Code.  

**Please note, the Redeem Code is valid from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC): October 16, 2025, 9:00:00 AM to October 23, 2025, 8:59:59 AM.**
